Description.0: The 'saucer' hull takes the shape of a long, thin, squished elipisoid.
Description.1: The nacelle takes the form of a ring around aft of the 'saucer' hull about halfway down the front and rear tapers.
Description.2: The secondary hull sits in the middle of the main hull as a simmilar flat ovoid that is perpendicular the the semi-major axis.
